title: A standout performance
review: An amazing portrayal of the rollercoaster life of Johnny Cash. The tale of the battle he had with himself. A musical phenomenon that will live on forever through his music and through this timeless classic.

title: Christopher Waltz.
review: This is the greatest of all Quentin Tarantino's movies, a quirky take on Nazi Germany full of blood and gore, as you would expect. From start to finish there was not one scene short of magnificent. This movie's is where Christopher Waltz marks his statement as one of the worlds greatest actors.. Au revoir Shoshana!

title: Fantastic watch
review: If you like gangster movies and movies based on real life characters, sit down and enjoy this gangsters paradise.

title: The best bank robbery film to date
review: An excellent bank robbery film with a great plot and great cast! It's has an amazing ending. There's action from start to finish and a bunch highly intelligent bank robberies.

title: The perfect psychotic drama
review: An amazing storyline with an amazing twist and great writing!

title: The best movie ever created
review: This movie is not my favourite film, but I do really believe it is the greatest film ever made, an absolute journey, the only movie on IMDb I would rate a 10

title: An outlandish masterpiece
review: A funny exciting adventure brought to life by a great cast. If you want to sit at home and get lost for 1hr 39mins this is your man. Excellent acting, directing and production! A weirdly wonderful experience.

title: An excellent remake
review: An Excellent remake of the Famous Willy Wonka and chocolate factory! A Tim Burton and Johnny Depp masterclass, the best remake of any great movie to date! Whacky, weird and wonderful!

title: Heath Ledgers masterfull performance
review: An absolutely amazing performance by Heath Ledger, acting at its finest, has become a timeless classic.

title: Amazing directing and acting
review: A masterpiece by Christopher Nolan that requires your full attention! An excellent brain teasing adventure.

title: An enjoyable adventure
review: An easy watch, would highly recommend, doesn't warrant any bad reviews.

movie_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
title: A fantastic ending
review: This movie was the perfect ending to the best movie series of all times. Start to finish perfect!

title: Curiosity killed the cat
review: An excellent film. In the first hour of the film I was never so curious to know about a characters life. Once we the viewer get to know Gatsby the fomo wears off! He is the life of the party, an extrovert, with a deep underlying issue which fuels the engine of his ambience.

title: The tale of an unsung hero
review: Set in the not too distant future in a world with a totalitarian ruled state, V, the masked rebel looks to reek havoc and battle against his oppressors.
